title: Refund Processing Policy
content: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days of receiving the returned item. The refund will be credited to your original payment method. Shipping costs are non-refundable except in cases of defective products.

title: Damaged or Defective Items
content: If you receive a damaged or defective item, please contact us within 48 hours with photos. We will arrange a free return shipping label and either send a replacement or issue a full refund.
